definitions.title: adv.
definitions.body: correctly, exactly (acc. to Haug:JBW 1853, 152 f. Scheft 68 f. from Zend derez, make firm, whence Skr. ptcp. pass. dṛḍha, firm, sure, suitable, Zend deresvta, holding firm, Pers. durust, whole, complete, correct; > Nö:KAT 2 617 from [[אַזְדָּא]], q. v.);—Ezr 7:23 ´[[יִתְעֲבֵד א]]:.
